mapper.sql: t.id, t.recharge_amount, t.fragment_cost, t.kind_cost, t.total_cost, t.cost_rate, t.channel_name, t.parent_id, t.channel_id, t.business_date, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.delete_flag
mapper.select: SELECT FROM dataware_final_channel_cost t WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT FROM dataware_final_channel_cost t WHERE ORDER BY id desc LIMIT #{start}, #{length}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dataware_final_channel_cost t WHERE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dataware_final_channel_cost ( id, recharge_amount, fragment_cost, kind_cost, total_cost, cost_rate, channel_name, parent_id, channel_id, business_date, create_time, delete_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{rechargeAmount}, #{fragmentCost}, #{kindCost}, #{totalCost}, #{costRate}, #{channelName}, #{parentId}, #{channelId}, #{businessDate}, #{createTime}, #{deleteFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dataware_final_channel_cost SET recharge_amount = #{rechargeAmount}, fragment_cost = #{fragmentCost}, kind_cost = #{kindCost}, total_cost = #{totalCost}, cost_rate = #{costRate}, channel_name = #{channelName}, parent_id = #{parentId}, channel_id = #{channelId}, business_date = #{businessDate}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE dataware_final_channel_cost SET delete_flag = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
